action.action-desc: Mr. Lawler (for himself, Ms. Crockett, Mr. McCormick, Ms. Kamlager-Dove, Mr. Moolenaar, and Mr. Huizenga) introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Foreign Affairs

form.official-title: To provide for control of remote access of items under the Export Control Reform Act of 2018.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the Remote Access Security Act.

section.header: Control of remote access of items under the Export Control Reform Act of 2018
section.text: The Export Control Reform Act of 2018 is amended as follows:

paragraph.text: In section 1742 (50 U.S.C. 4801), by adding at the end the following:

subparagraph.text: access to an item subject to the jurisdiction of the United States by a foreign person through a network connection, including the internet or a cloud computing service, from a location other than where the item is physically located; or
any other form of access specified in regulations promulgated by the Secretary.
in paragraph (1)—

clause.text: in subparagraph (A), by inserting or remote access of such items after export of items; and
in subparagraph (B), by inserting or remote access of such items after export of items; and

subparagraph.text: in paragraph (2)—

clause.text: in the matter preceding subparagraph (A), by striking and in-country transfer of items and inserting in-country transfer, and remote access of items; and
in subparagraph (A), by inserting or remote access after the release.

subparagraph.text: in subsection (a)—

clause.text: in paragraph (1), by striking and at the end;
in paragraph (2)(F), by striking the period at the end and inserting ; and; and
by adding at the end the following:

paragraph.text: the remote access of items subject to the jurisdiction of the United States by a foreign person.

subparagraph.text: in subsection (b)—

clause.text: in paragraph (6), by striking and at the end;
in paragraph (7), by striking the period at the end and inserting ; and; and
by adding at the end the following:

paragraph.text: regulate the remote access of items described in (a)(3).

subparagraph.text: in subsection (c)—

clause.text: by striking or in-country transfer each place it appears and inserting in-country transfer, or remote access; and
by striking subsections (b)(1) or (b)(2) and inserting subsections (b)(1), (b)(2), or (b)(8).
